sentences.en: A rhinoceros has large horns and thick, protective skin.
sentences.cn: 犀牛有很大的犀角和厚厚的保护皮肤.
一头犀牛笨重地向他们走来.

sentences.en: Carruthers had been gored by a rhinoceros.
sentences.cn: 卡拉瑟斯被犀牛顶伤了。

sentences.en: Contrary to its name, the black rhinoceros is actually grey in color.
sentences.cn: 有别于它的名字，黑犀牛事实上是灰色的。

sentences.en: For 50 million years, the rhinoceros, that unbeautiful but unique beast, has survived.
sentences.cn: 犀牛, 这种虽不美丽但独特的动物, 已存活繁衍了五千万年.

sentences.en: He called me a rhinoceros three years ago.
He ignored our criticism. He had a hidea rhinoceros.
sentences.cn: 他不理睬我们的批评, 真是个脸皮厚.

sentences.en: Hit Enter when Rhinoceros asks for the direction of the curves . Use the options shown below.
sentences.cn: 当询问曲线方向时,用下图的设置回车继续.

sentences.en: In this island is also found the rhinoceros, an animal less than the elephant, but larger than the buffalo.
sentences.cn: 在这个岛上还能找到犀牛，一种比大象小一点的动物，可是比水牛大。
犀牛 - 凶猛的蛰伏者.

sentences.en: Rhinoceros Give me a break, were been waddling every day.
sentences.cn: 犀牛甲:饶了我吧, 我们晃了一整天了都.

sentences.en: Rhinoceros horn was a unique traded commodity in Champa.
sentences.cn: 犀牛角是占城特有的贸易商品.

sentences.en: Rhinoceros: Come on. If he wants to freeze to death, let him.
sentences.cn: 犀牛甲: 走吧, 他想冻死就让他去吧,别拦著.

sentences.en: Rhinoceros: Dome on . If he wants to freeze to death, let him.
sentences.cn: 犀牛甲: 走吧,他想冻死就让他去吧,别拦着.

sentences.en: RHINOCEROTONEMA RHINOCEROTIS GEN . ET SP . NOV. FROM THE RHINOCEROS UNICORNIS IN BEIJING ZOO ( NEMATODA, STQNGYLIDAE: GLOBOCEPHALINAE )
sentences.cn: 独角犀的线虫一新属新种 ( 线虫纲: 圆线科,球首亚科 )

sentences.en: Some of the projects will also support conservation efforts of near-extinct animals in Kalimantan, including rhinoceros, Irrawaddy dolphins, and orangutans.
sentences.cn: 其中一些项目也将支持对加里曼丹濒危动物的保护活动，包括犀牛、伊洛瓦底江海豚和猩猩。

sentences.en: The body of the rhinoceros likes a cattle, the head likes a triangle.
sentences.cn: 犀牛的形体像牛, 头呈三角形.

sentences.en: The game wardens tranquillized the rhinoceros with a drugged dart.
sentences.cn: 猎物保护区管理员用麻醉射器让犀牛静了下来.

trans.tran_cn: 犀牛，脸皮和犀牛皮一样厚
trans.tran_en: a large heavy African or Asian animal with thick skin and either one or two horns on its nose
